title: The Iceblade Magician Rules Over the World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   School Life
tags: Academy   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Friendship   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Mikoshiba Nana   御子柴 奈々
description:
Arnold Academy of Magic, a prestigious academy that has produced many great magicians.

A boy, Ray White, decided to attend there as the only magician from an ordinary family to enter since the Academy began.

Surrounding him are all students from aristocrat and magician families that disdain him.

But people don’t know.

He is a person who has made many achievements in the former Far East battle, and is now said to be the strongest among the seven great magicians in the world.

Despite being disregarded as a magician, he eventually shows his power to the surroundings…!?>
